email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Can you check if this is feasible? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s specifications and any additional terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can adjust the rate to $50.00 per metric ton, which is quite competitive given the vessel’s condition and availability. The MV Ocean Star is fully compliant with all regulations and has a clean inspection record. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable, but we’d like to push the demurrage rate down to $18,000 per day. Also, can you confirm the laytime details? We’d prefer a 72-hour laytime window. Looking forward to your response. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can agree to $18,000 per day for demurrage. The laytime will be 72 hours, starting from October 15. Please let me know if we can proceed with these terms, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Let’s proceed with the agreed terms: $50.00 per metric ton, $18,000 demurrage, and 72-hour laytime starting October 15. Please send over the draft agreement, and we’ll review it promptly. Thanks for your assistance. Best, John
